I really wanted to like these! I ordered the size 12 and 14 based on my measurements and the size guide. Size 12 was too small in my thighs but too big in the waist. The pockets don’t lay flat so you can see the white fabric inside of them, which makes them look sloppy. If you have big hips, I’d pass on these.

I bought for a black slacks uniform dickies are cool and I was trying to bring a little style to my uniform which is hard. The pants stay up and fit great. I’m about a 26 normally. I like that the pants fit but the waist band doesn’t dig in. It seems to flare out a little. Makes tucking better. I’m 5’6” also good length. Can be rolled a little or worn straight.

Very good fitting. Excited to wear it more. Material feels very strong and durable. Loved it so far. for reference: I am 5’11 and about 165 pounds. I ordered a 6… length is good and it fits good as well.

I ordered it twice and both times they sent me the wrong color. Order navy blue and they sent me black.

评论概述: Get several sizes to try on!
评论详情: I am 5’3” and around 135lb  with an hourglass figure, mostly  wider hips and a big ass. I needed black slacks for a new service job and after reading many reviews about sizing, I opted to originally buy a 2short and a 4short, as most complaints were in the fit at the natural waist being super large. I got the 4short first and I could barely, BARELY get them up over my bum. They fit in the natural waist, but the crotch seam was so tight I could barely stand to have them on for a second longer. The length in the leg was pretty perfect, though. I did eventually buy a size 6short, which I can slide on comfortably and  the crotch seam fits appropriately. The length of the pant leg is almost too long, and , there is a decent amount of gapping at the natural waist. I’m going to get a belt and have them hemmed slightly.If you are a petite woman with a little extra curve I would purchase true to size of what you’d normally buy at the store to start, and order a backup pair as well.

I bought these because I loved my other pair I bought from like Pacsun. But let me tell you !!! The sizing is way different !! I think my other pair are a 2 in juniors and these are a 2 in WOMEN. So I ended up hemming them a crap ton… anyway, I still love these and wear them all the time. It was a great purchase and they’re so comfortable! Highly recommend.

The material of the pants is good and as expected. But they are WAY TOO LARGE. Large in the hips and have very long inseams. For reference I am 5'3" and about 113 lb. I usually buy size 4/27 regular. I tried that size with these pants and it was terrible. I returned that and tried a size 2/26 SHORT, it was still large in the hips and still had a very long inseam. I have the same Dickies but in men's size 29x29 and those fit way better(yes even in the hips idk how that works). Overall if you're a short-ish woman who's been recommended these, you will be disappointed.
I’m more petite, and so I ordered smallest size, made sure sizing was correct for me. A 2 is still too big and too long. They should add a size 0.

As most of the reviews stated this is just too boxy and runs large (I ordered a 2). The first three pictures are of these pants and the last three are of the men’s version of the 874 for reference. Highly recommend going the men’s route if you like the look of Dickies.
These are not stretchy and are ill fitting. I have no hips/butt and they did not fit well. Went up a size and they gapped like crazy. Ended up returning.
Run small in the waist good work material tho
Pants went all the way up to my boobs

So I purchased a 4 and it fits really well! There is a bit of space but doesn’t show (without belt) or a bunches up at the waist (with belt) so I’m relieved this doesn’t do either. Also it’s comfortable, standing or sitting. It’s a little longer than expected considering I’m average height but I normally like cuffing my pants once or twice anyways!

Great fit

I love Dickies to work in. Normally i'd buy the 774 short but i wanted a higher waist because I wear a duty belt and the weapon pulls down the belt because they're low waisted. These 884 work pants however are nice and high above the waist and quite long too. They say they are 28 inch inseam but that's untrue. More like a 31 or 32 inch inseam but the fit is great! I love them and will be sure to buy more pairs!

Like everyone else in the reviews, I tried to figure out what size to order! Didn’t know whether to size up or down….so I did both! I am 5’2, 150 lbs. A little more pear shaped than anything, thicker bum and thighs. I’m usually a true size 10, always getting short length. I bought these dickies in black size 12 short and size 8 short. Not sure why I didn’t get a size 10 short for a true size but it worked out because 8 short was perfect for me! Definitely drowned in the 12. Not sure if sizing is more inconsistent when you compare colors and/or length reg or short. But for me, definitely had to size down!
Bought these for emt school. Definitely not “work” pants. Could barely bend over to tie my shoes.

I carry most of my weight in my middle. In order to fit my waist, I had to order such a large size they bagged in the butt and legs. I am 5' 5" and 160 lbs, with most of my weight in my middle.If you have a waist and are curvy, this will fit the bill.
Terrible fit.  Not fit for women's sizing.

I’m typically a 4 so I got a 4R and the waist is HUGEE!!! Then I returned and got a 2 but the waist is still too big but now the legs are too tight!! 🥹 like these are so cute!! Item was prime shipping 2 day delivery. Wasn’t delivered until 2 weeks later. Item not as described. Tried to process return and was refused help. Do not purchase!

I give this product 2 stars because when I received it, it smelled like it came out of a fish market....HORRIBLE!!  The material quality seems good and durable, however not sure how it would be when washed.  I needed a bigger size for comfortable fit,  but because of these issues I do not like.
Bought size accordingly and too big folded down top waist to keep them up and made for a long waisted person. Otherwise everything that I got in a men's size as far as durability and ability to move.

I had to return because of the odd sizing. I ordered up a size because the reviews said it could run a bit smaller. Fit great around thighs and hips but had a comically large gap around my waist. Not sure who these are made for but it wasn’t me.

My wife bought a pair of 10 regular from this company.  They were way too long but we decided to just have them hemmed and move on.  She did like the quality so the next day we ordered a Beige pair (this order) from the same company in 10 "Short" and they were the exact same length as the "Regular" size she bought the previous day.  I checked the tags and they were both marked as stated but were the exact same length.  I guess now we have to get 2 pair hemmed.  The reason for the 2 star rating is due to the fact that it's probably going to cost us another $15 per pair to have them shortened.

i have truly never worn pants like these before. i felt like i was putting on a suit of armor, they were so stiff, and i have never before considered that, like some work shoes, some pants might need breaking in. unfortunately for me, these pants were too tight around my thighs, and too loose around my waist. overall, they just weren't worth the effort.
Good but after a couple washes the seaming starts to rip

These pants are great for work, nice and comfy! my only complaint is that they are too loose on the waist for their size but otherwise good.
While the pants fit alright, there was a distinct "fake leather" smell that was very strong. Pants were extremely rigid with little give in the waistband and material of the pants.
My daughter needed these pants for work. She 6’2” and the tall size fits her perfectly.
I would get the 30 inseams only I am only 5’2” got one size bigger than needed just because be bending a lot. But like the feel and feel very durable.
They run small i usually wear a 12-14. They seem really solid though. Just would be nice if they had bigger sizes

I have a 32 inch (sometimes 33 inch) waist, i got the Size 12 Short in blue. It's still a little loose, but comfortable enough to work in. It's a lint magnet, so just be aware in you have furry children. They are kinda long for a short labeled pair of pants, but maybe i have shorter legs. I would buy these again.
In general the idea of it is perfect.  I'm 5'9 bought a 12 long. And it's perfect I don't even really need a belt.

评论概述: For fashion not suited for work
评论详情: These pants are not the same as the men's. There is no back pocket and the front pockets are too small for anything more than car keys. The thighs are too tight making it hard to bend or crouch. I'll stick to buying men's Dickies for construction.

评论概述: Runs small but they’re just like the ones I had in the 90s!
评论详情: It’s been a hell of a time figuring out what actual size to get… both on the dickies page and on Amazon half the reviews said they’re either too big or too small so I ended up ordering my usual size 10 (like the size pants I would buy at target for example). I’m 5’8” and around 160# with a big ol butt for reference. Anyway the 10 was way too small so I ordered a 14 instead and they fit pretty well now. They’re just like the ones I used to have in the 90s in HS so I’m happy with that. The regular is a bit too long, should’ve gotten a short…. It’s ok tho I roll them up anyway. They have a white band around the waist on the inside. Seem pretty sturdy and good quality, just beware there’s not really any stretch to the material.

Purchased these for EMT clinicals and had to return due to no mobility in them. The fabric is extremely stiff and I couldn’t even squat down in them. Very restricting. If I sized up they would have been way too big in the waist. The only reason I gave two stars is the simple fact they offer “long” sizes which is much appreciated and I also liked that these were more high waisted. If the material was different these would have been great.
Fit as expected after reading other reviews. A little big in waist but that’s how we wanted them
Loved these pants, wore them twice, but the waist seam ripped out along with the belt loops way too quickly. I hadn’t even washed them yet.
i normally wear a womens size 10 or 30 in pants and these fit perfectly - a little big in the waist even. go figure. would recommend sizing way down. pants have no stretch very solid
These are the best fitting pants I’ve had in years. I love The fabric and the fit is great. Will order other colors in the future
They are very sturdy material
I bought these hoping that they would fit snuggly but I find they ride too high and have zero give. I also get a weird front gap that shouldn't happen on women's pants.
